name: Red Morning Light
wikiSummary: "Red Morning Light" is the first single taken from the Youth and Young Manhood album by the American rock band Kings of Leon. It follows the release of the EP, Holy Roller Novocaine, and was featured also as the first track on the upcoming album.  The song was the leading track in sports video game FIFA Football 2004.
wikiText:
"Red Morning Light" is the first single taken from the Youth and Young Manhood album by the American rock band Kings of Leon. It follows the release of the EP, Holy Roller Novocaine, and was featured also as the first track on the upcoming album.
 
 The song was the leading track in sports video game FIFA Football 2004.
